title: How to run an AB Test in Node.js
description: To run a simple A/B experiment in a webpage with Node.js using the Statsig SDK, you'll go through a few essential steps. This will involve setting up a simple Node.js server, integrating with the Statsig SDK for A/B testing, and configuring your experiment in the Statsig console.

frontMatter.title: How to run an AB Test in Node.js
